title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed with any model served by Ollama.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Deno, Bun and modern browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs or chat models inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, RAG, multi-user); runs in Docker.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; fluent builder API, streaming, embeddings, list/pull/delete models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Convenience CLI wrapper around Ollama REST API with prompts history, model aliases and shell completion.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot-like VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline suggestions.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB; ready-to-run Python notebook.

title: ollama-agents
summary: Proof-of-concept autonomous agent framework powered by Ollama models; includes ReAct & reflection loops.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix derivation for Ollama server & CLI; pinned builds for Linux/macOS with CUDA/rocm variants.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Ready-made docker-compose stacks for Ollama + Open-WebUI, GPU pass-through, CPU fallback.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Unofficial C# / .NET client for Ollama; supports .NET 6+ with async streaming and strongly-typed responses.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing an async client for the Ollama HTTP API; tokio-based with Serde models.

title: ollama-go
summary: Unofficial Go client for Ollama; small surface, idiomatic error handling, context cancellation.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django package adding Ollama models as a backend for django-ai chatbots with admin integration.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI service template exposing Ollama endpoints with JWT auth, rate limits, and OpenAPI docs.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat component that talks to Ollama; includes session memory, model selector, and voice input.

title: ollama-reddit-community
summary: Active subreddit for Ollama users; share models, troubleshoot setups, announce integrations.
